verses.name: Romans 1:7
verses.text: To all that be in Rome, beloved of God, called to be saints: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: Romans 1:8
verses.text: First, I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all, that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world.

verses.name: Romans 1:9
verses.text: For God is my witness, whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son, that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers;
